about_the_game:
A TRUE COOP EXPERIENCE

Face the Citadel's many challenges solo or in a party up to 4 players. On higher difficulties, take on roles like DPS, Healer or Tank to face the brutal encounters that awaits you.

CHALLENGING RAID BOSSES

Confront the Citadel's Guardians with their unique set of mechanics that will reward players for understanding how they attack.

CHOOSE YOUR OWN WAY TO PLAY

Create your own Loadout by selecting 4 abilities from over 45 abilities as well as your suit and your weapon. During your expedition, build your character up with numerous passives that will change the way you play each run.

LOOT BETTER AND STRONGER WEAPONS

Rifles, Lasers, Rocket Launchers and Melee Weapons are all part of the vast arsenal that you will encounter in the Citadel. Upgrading your weapons with unique modifiers and effects to adapt them to your teams' needs will be a crucial part of your success.

DISCOVER THE EVER-CHANGING CITADEL

With a procedurally generated world, the citadel will challenge you with new layouts and encounters each time you explore. With Cursed Weapons, drones to help you out, altars to modify your weapons and more, the Citadel has many secrets for you to discover.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 960 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 7th Generation Intel I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Discover the Citadel, a mythical place suspended above a black hole filled with demons, curses, loot and incredible power in this Action Role-Based Rogue-lite inspired by Risk of Rain 2 and Overwatch!
